𓐍𓂋𓊤 “cry“, abundant root, related to call howl kuon 犬 quǎn (dog,wolf) 口丂 koǔ (+cow)

𓐍𓂋 𓊤 𓃭 𓅱 𓀁 | voice, noise | cry 𒅗

𒅗 KIR₄ gu₃ kiri₃ CRY 𒅗𒄯 “cry, sound, noise, voice”

𒅗𒊑𒀀 gu₃-ri-a "cry" 𒍀 𒉆𒅗𒊏 nam-gu₃-rah₂ ˢʸnamgurah "crying, shouting"

𒅗𒊏𒄴;𒅗𒊏 gu₃e₃ra cry "to shout"
